title: Left 4 Dead 2 V2.0.2.7 Full
description:
Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008.

This co-operative action horror FPS takes you and your friends through the cities, swamps and cemeteries of the Deep South, from Savannah to New Orleans across five expansive campaigns.

Youï¿½ll play as one of four new survivors armed with a wide and devastating array of classic and upgraded weapons. In addition to firearms, youï¿½ll also get a chance to take out some aggression on infected with a variety of carnage-creating melee weapons, from chainsaws to axes and even the deadly frying pan.

- No Steam account required
- Not Riped
- 100% uncut
- All textures included (no missing textures)
- Language: English
- Perfect size for a DVD9

Developer: Valve Software
Publisher: Valve Software
Genre: Action / FPS
Platform: PC / Windows

Release date: World: 17 November 2009
USA: 17 November 2009
Europe: 17 November 2009
Play modes: single / multiplayer
Multiplayer: LAN / Internet | number of players: 1-8
Game language: English
Age Requirements: 18+  |  media: 1 DVD
Suggested system requirements:
Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz, 1 GB RAM, graphic card GeForce 7600 or better, 7.5 GB HDD, Windows XP/Vista/7
